version_description:
+ Brand new version including:
- New stunning design
- New Apple Watch version
- Fix bugs

We have heard all your feedback and we're proud today to present you with a brand new version update. We're so excited for this version to be ready just before Christmas. This update includes:

[+] Support for all WebOS TV.
[+] Support for Netcast and auto reconnection made easy.
[+] Added Touchpad, Smart TV, Back and source function.
[+] Added shortcuts and list of apps.
[+] Added channel list and 3D controls.

Please leave us your feedback and rate us on the app store to help us make this app even better for you.

Happy Holidays.

We're listening to your feedback and working hard to improve the app. Here's what's new:
[+] Apple Watch: Fix the Apple Watch bug when connecting to the Smart TV.
[+] Added 3D quick action: You can power off, source or mute your Smart TV from your phone home screen.
[+] Added some improvements to the popular apps launcher.
[+] Apps such as Prime, Now TV are working on WebOS
[+] Added some new apps to the list
[+] General performance and reliability improvements.

If you like our progress and our customer support please leave us a review on the App Store. Thank you very much and happy holidays to you all.

New Year, new update!

We're listening to your feedback and been working hard to improve the app. We’re committed to providing the best in the class Remote app for Smart LG and we won’t stop until we get there.

Four BIG announcements to kick off this year.
[+] You can finally turn on your TV using the app. We’re so proud to be the first ones to bring this feature (works on compatible Smart TV only with the Mobile TV On option running webOS)
[+] You can just the volume of your TV using the iPhone/iPad side buttons (The app needs to be opened in the foreground)
[+] We have made the app twice faster to find and connect to your Smart TV.
[+] A brand new Apple Watch version with easily accessible buttons.

Here’s the rest of the changes in this update:

[+] A much better-improved design.
[+] Added a media view with scroll to adjust the volume it's super fast and nice to use.
[+] A much faster and accurate touchpad.
[+] Added media controls (Play, Pause, Rewind, Forward) and also Exit, Infos and more.
[+] An entire new large new space for the touchpad.
[+] An option to disable the haptic feedback on the Apple Watch.
[+] A better support for iPhone X.
[+] General performance and reliability improvements.

If you’re happy with this new update and our progress please let us know and rate our app on the app store. This will help us a lot to improve the app even more. We have got some new amazing new features to come in our future update.

+ Fixed bug preventing TV from shutting down

If you're happy with our progress and how quickly we fix bugs please show it to us by giving us 5 stars. Thank you

+ Fix ads placement
+ Fix minors bugs and improve performances
+ Fix the bug related to restoring the in-app purchase

You've been waiting for this, we've done it. We revamped the app: new design, new logo, new colors. We are very proud to release this update, it has so many improvements and capabilities.

It is not only an aesthetic change, but we also improved the experience: add Siri shortcuts, Widget, new icons and much, much more.

The list of a few of the changes here:

+ Brand new design.
+ Added the list of applications and trackpad.
+ Add Siri shortcuts.
+ Ability to turn on/off your TV (compatible TVs only).
+ Added a widget where you can interact with your TV without opening the app.
+ Added the possibility of having multiple TVs and switch between them.
+ Apple watch version much more improved.

We would really appreciate your feedback please open the app to discover the new version and share your thoughts with us in the contact us section.

- [Bug Fix] Fixed an issue preventing the app from correctly updating the TV details when the IP changes.
- [Improvement]: Detect if the user is using a VPN that causes the TV not to appear on the list during the configuration.

Happy Holidays to everyone
